video_prompt: Giant spaceship descends over futuristic city, its lights rippling across the water. Smaller flying vehicles zoom past the waterfront, their reflections shimmering. City lights twinkle and shift as the atmosphere deepens from twilight to night. Stars slowly appear and nebulous clouds drift across the sky.
image_prompt: futuristic city at twilight/night, dominated by a massive, illuminated spacecraft hovering above a reflective waterfront. The elongated ship has glowing orange/yellow windows. A sprawling cyberpunk cityscape with countless lights extends into the distance, with two smaller flying vehicles near the water. The dark blue sky is filled with sparkling stars and a bright celestial object. Vertical shot, awe-inspiring, emphasis on scale.
refined_video_prompt: A giant spaceship slowly descends, its lights actively rippling and spreading across the water below. Smaller flying vehicles dynamically zoom past, their reflections shimmering and moving. City lights begin to twinkle and shift as the ambient light deepens from twilight to night. Stars gradually appear, and nebulous clouds gracefully drift across the sky.
